mapper.select: SELECT u.name, u.url, p.count FROM png p INNER JOIN url u ON p.url = u.id LEFT JOIN `character` c ON p.`character` = c.id WHERE c.name = #{character}

SELECT p.`character` id, c.name `character`, c.own, u.name, u.url, p.count FROM png p LEFT JOIN url u ON p.url = u.id LEFT JOIN `character` c ON p.`character` = c.id ORDER BY p.`character`, p.type, p.`index`
mapper.insert: INSERT png (`character`, type, `index`, url) SELECT #{character}, #{type}, #{index}, max(id) FROM url
